Title: Government launches new AI Mission
Summary: The Indian government has announced a national AI mission to promote research, startups, and AI-driven innovation across sectors.

Title: Sensex rises 350 points amid global rally
Summary: Indian stock markets saw strong buying as global cues improved, with banking and IT stocks leading the rally.

Title: New study finds water on Mars surface
Summary: Scientists from NASA revealed new satellite images suggesting traces of hydrated minerals on the Martian surface.

Title: CBSE introduces new skill-based curriculum
Summary: The Central Board of Secondary Education announced a revised curriculum focusing on coding, data science, and problem-solving skills.

Title: India defeats Australia in thrilling final
Summary: In a nail-biting finish, India clinched a victory over Australia with exceptional bowling in the last overs.
